user.title: Akuvox SmartPlus Sign-In
user.description: Choose a sign-in method to connect to your Akuvox SmartPlus account:

sms_sign_in_warning.title: SMS Verification
sms_sign_in_warning.description:
⚠️ Warning ⚠️

Choosing this sign-in method will log you out of the SmartPlus app on your phone.

To stay logged in to the app and use both the app and this integration, please use the `App Token` sign-in method instead.

sms_sign_in.title: SMS Verification
sms_sign_in.description: Please enter your mobile phone number to receive your verification SMS:

app_tokens_sign_in.title: Sign In via App Tokens
app_tokens_sign_in.description:
Please enter your account details below.

ℹ️ To obtain your tokens please review the documentation.

verify_sms_code.title: SMS Code Verification
verify_sms_code.description: Please enter the SMS code you received.

data_description.sms_code: It may take up to 60 seconds to receive the SMS.

init.title: Replace User Token
init.description:
Enter your SmartPlus app user's token to allow Home Assistant to communicate with Akuvox's servers whilst remaining signed in on your device.

Refer to the documentation for instructions on how to extract your token string.
